attributes.action: suspend the housing targets for North Somerset determined through the Regional Spatial Strategy which would see 12,000 more homes built in Weston-super-Mare and 26,000 more across the district over the next 20 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recession has placed new and unplanned for pressures on the Weston-super-Mare and North Somerset economy. Our priority must be more jobs, not more houses. 

Pressing ahead with nationally determined regional housing targets which are already out of date and meaningless in the current economic climate is a mistake.

My petition calls upon Government to suspend the current top-down imposition of excessive housing targets through the Regional Spatial Strategy.
